author: Xaviermaassen Community Member
title: Re: Google Nest Mini
text:
Saturday
My Google Nest Mini doesn’t respond at all. No lights are working and can’t find it in Google Home. Tried to unplug it 11 times. No response. Sometimes two lights are blinking. But no response either or traceable in Google Home.
Tuesday
Hi xaviermaassen,
Thank you for reaching out to the community. I apologize that your Google Nest Mini doesn't respond even though you tried to unplug it many times, but it still doesn't work. I understand how frustrating this can be. I'm here to help.
Before I begin, I need to ask a few questions for further assistance:
Please keep me posted. I look forward to your response.
Regards,
Byron
Tuesday
Hello Byron, Google Nest Mini (2nd gen). Two white lights. But I haven’t seen them recently. Now there are no lights and no reaction whatsoever.
Tuesday
Hi xaviermaassen,
Thank you for your response. Based on the answers provided. Please do the following:
Before I proceed and do the workaround, please submit the feedback to the Google Home app. Here are the steps:
After you submit the feedback, follow the below steps:
Try to do a factory data reset one more time:
Let me know how it goes and keep me posted.
Regards,
Byron
yesterday
Hello Byron,
Two things, I deleted the Google Nest from my Google Home app since it was offline for a while and I wanted to reinstall it. So I don't see it now in the app. I can't find it either when an Add Google Nest equipment.
Second, if I unplug the power cord, wait 10 seconds, then plug the power cord back in and then wait there are no LEDs that light up. Not one.
Let me know what to do.
an hour ago
Hi xaviermaassen,
Thank you for your response. I apologize that none of the steps work. Let's look at other options.
The team would like to learn more about this behavior. When you get a chance, please fill out this form and let us know when you’re finished. We’ll have someone reach out to you via email from there.
Let me know once you're done and keep me posted.
Regards,
Byron
